alert.note: Alert for Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 7:42PM EST until December 24 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Newport/Morehead City NC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina... Tar River At Greenville affecting Pitt County. For the Tar River...including Greenville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tar River at Greenville. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Minor flooding of low lying areas adjacent to the river can be expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 12.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to 13.4 feet early Thursday afternoon. It will then fall early Friday afternoon. It will rise to 13.3 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps. The next statement will be issued by Wednesday morning at 1000 AM EST.
